about_the_game:
A lone celestial warrior travels across his cosmic and forsaken afterlife to rid the evil taking root. Each locale writhes in shadow and decay where horrifying, lovecraftian-inspired monstrosities lurk. Through combat prowess and careful exploration, the warrior must be vigilant with his mental constitution as he traverses his once-idyllic lands to cleanse them.

Fragments of the Afterlife showcases Souls-like inspired combat set in an afterlife in the faraway cosmos, where the wisps of animals and mortals live after death.

Fragments comprises four domains, each adapting a unique biome with fantastical yet grounded landscapes. The game takes inspiration from famous mythologies and imbues them with conventional dark fantasy elements. For instance, one domain contains a ruined city under the moonlit shade of a towering tree. In this domain, a Caretaker – one of four elemental guardians – oversees each domain until our warriors return.

The theme of perseverance is rooted in his journey. He is a fallen celestial tasked with reclaiming his afterlife and to achieve this must vanquish his Caretakers in the form of climactic boss fights. They, now twisted in mind and body, serve the Shapeshifter, who is hellbent on blanketing the afterlife in total darkness.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 3GB, AMD RX 470 4GB, Intel UHD graphics 630

short_description: As a horror-based RPG, Fragments utilizes a dynamic camera system as well as breathtaking stylized graphics to enhance the fast-paced combat to the in-depth lore. Traverse four unique domains defeating the lost to grow stronger, learn skills and save the afterlife.
